de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.histogram

Class IntDynamicHistogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.histogram.AbstractStaticHistogram
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.histogram.IntStaticHistogram
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.histogram.IntDynamicHistogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Histogram, IntHistogram

    public class IntDynamicHistogram
extends IntStaticHistogram
    A flexible histogram storing int, that can dynamically adapt the number of bins to the data fed into the histogram.
    Since:
    0.5.5
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • downsample

        protected int downsample(int[] data,
             int start,
             int end,
             int size)
        Perform downsampling on a number of bins.
        Parameters:
        data - Data array (needs cast!)
        start - Interval start
        end - Interval end (exclusive)
        size - Intended size - extra bins are assumed to be empty, should be a power of two
        Returns:
        New bin value
